requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or Newer
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 260 or ATI 4850
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Gamepad or Controller Recommended

Minimum:
